text: Tɔɔzei nu mɔinmɔin ge la ɠɛni ɓɔɠɔ ɲadeni, ma un ge daa ma mɛɛ ga niiti ti zeɠeni Efelayime, Manasé, Isakaal, ta Zaɓulɔn wolodamaiti su, kɛlɛ anɛɛ naa ʋe, ti Pake baala ziʋoi miini, anɛɛ ni tɔgi ɠɛni naa laalɔɠɔma. Naa ɠa é kɛɛni Ezekiase GALA falini ti ʋɛ ɠani, é ɠɛ ma: «Ɠɔoɠɔ GALAGI, ɗɛi ɗa-vai ʋagai, niima nuiti pɛ suvaayɛ,
